# Remote Indexes for Minecraft Data Documentation

This file is a curated navigation + reference hub for:

- Fast internal file lookup (docs and schemas).
- Stable external references used when authoring or validating content.
- Enhanced context awareness through remote repository indexing.
- A single source of truth for important links.
- Facilitating easier updates and maintenance of links.
- Improving discoverability of resources for contributors and users.
- Supporting collaboration by providing a shared reference point.
- Streamlining onboarding for new contributors.

## Internal references

Quick access to important resources in this project:

- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/Mosberg/Mosberg.github.io/tree/main/projects/minecraft-data-docs/)
- [README File](../README.md)
- [Markdown Documentation Files](../docs/)
- [JSON Schemas Files](../schemas/)

- [Docs Fabricmc Develop Entities Damage Types](https://docs.fabricmc.net/develop/entities/damage-types) - Guide on defining custom damage types

- [Docs Fabricmc Develop Sounds Creating Custom Sounds](https://docs.fabricmc.net/develop/sounds/custom-sounds) - Guide on creating and adding custom sounds

- [Docs Fabricmc Develop Codecs](https://docs.fabricmc.net/develop/codecs/) - Guide on using codecs for data serialization
